attributes.action: Reconsider to allow international travel to visit partners and family
attributes.additional_details: It is vital for people’s mental wellbeing. It is inhumane to isolate and separate people and their family/partner considering the current situation.
attributes.background: The Government should reconsider to class in-person interaction with family members and unmarried partners abroad as an essential reason to travel.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565102
